com.teamboid.twitterapi.dm

Class DirectMessageJSON

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamboid.twitterapi.dm.DirectMessageJSON
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectMessage, java.io.Serializable

    public class DirectMessageJSON
extends java.lang.Object
implements DirectMessage, java.io.Serializable
    Handles parsing JSON and assigning values into a DirectMessage interface.
    Author:
    Aidan Follestad
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
